English: the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)

d.f: `憲兵~`勤務~`的~`計畫~`執行機關~，`並~`負~`有~`協調~`執勤~`地區~`所有~`憲兵~`勤務~`之~`責~。`區分~`為~`旅~（`團~）`級~、`營~`級~、`連~`級~`等~`憲兵隊~，`設置~`於~`全國~`各~`重要~`城市~，`並~`冠~`以~`該~`城市~`的~`名稱~，`如~`臺~`北~`憲兵隊~。

English: the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
